Body: Description: We are having space issue which may affect the functionality of EPP server, Kindly let know how we can free space.
What We've Learned Updated: Client is reporting their EPP appliance is running low on disk space and request assistance from us.
Next Steps Updated: Will need to set up a remote session.
Invitation updated. Attendees: Marian Ilies, Adrian Draghici
Invitation updated. Attendees: No attendees listed
Invitation updated. Attendees: Marian Ilies, Adrian Draghici, Vignesh Haldankar

What We've Learned Updated: Connected remote along with Adrian to assist Vignesh.
We logged into SSH to remove old backup files from /var/eppfiles/logbackup and /var/log/backups to remove backups older than 6 months. This allowed the client to clear more than 50% of their storage. Also, even though they had 89GB of shadows, due to the Audit Log Backup, they shadows will be removed as well freeing up more space.
Next Steps Updated: Will send a follow up note and will wait for their confirmation.
